resources.string: Введите 6-значный код который мы прислали вам

string.name: fui_resend_code_in
string.translation_description: Countdown timer text that the user needs to wait for before attempting to resend verification sms

string.name: fui_verify_your_phone_title
string.translation_description: Button text to complete phone number verification

string.name: fui_verifying
string.translation_description: Progress dialog text while phone number is being verified

string.name: fui_incorrect_code_dialog_body
string.translation_description: Inline error when incorrect sms verification code is being used to verify

string.name: fui_error_too_many_attempts
string.translation_description: Error message when the phone number has been used too many times

string.name: fui_error_quota_exceeded
string.translation_description: Error message when the Firebase project's quota has been exceeded.

string.name: fui_error_session_expired
string.translation_description: Error message when SMS confirmation code has expired.

string.translation_description: Label for phone number input form

string.name: fui_auto_verified
string.translation_description: Popup informing the user that their phone number was automatically verified

string.name: fui_resend_code
string.translation_description: Link text to resend verification sms
